amendment.description: Amendment extends from six months to one year the filing deadline for judicial review of actions taken by an agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of February 28, 1995) to extend from six months to one year the filing deadline for judicial review of actions taken by an agency which has the effect of diminishing the fair market value of an individual's property.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ewing amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 5 (Roll no. 184).
